unnormalised: ## Level Up Your Social Game: It's All About Brand Collaborations, Yaar!
normalised: ## Level Up Your Social Game: It is All About Brand Collaborations, Yaar!

unnormalised: Hey fam! So you're trying to make some noise on social media, right? Building that personal brand, maybe even thinking about influencer status? Listen up, because I'm dropping some serious gyaan: it’s all about brand collaborations!
normalised: Hey fam! So you are trying to make some noise on social media, right? Building that personal brand, maybe even thinking about influencer status? Listen up, because I am dropping some serious gyaan: it is all about brand collaborations!

unnormalised: Think about it – instead of slogging away solo, you team up with a brand and BOOM! Instant exposure to a whole new audience. It's like Diwali fireworks for your reach! But it's not just about the numbers, it's about finding the right fit. Partnering with a fitness brand when you’re all about butter chicken and binge-watching Netflix isn’t exactly a match made in heaven, is it?
normalised: Think about it – instead of slogging away solo, you team up with a brand and boom! Instant exposure to a whole new audience. It is like Diwali fireworks for your reach! But it is not just about the numbers, it is about finding the right fit. Partnering with a fitness brand when you are all about butter chicken and binge-watching Netflix is not exactly a match made in heaven, is it?

unnormalised: I remember when my friend Priya collaborated with a local boutique in Lajpat Nagar back in January 2023. She’s a fashion blogger, and the boutique had some killer ethnic wear. The campaign was a total hit! She showcased their kurtis on her Insta feed, did a live session on 26/01/2023 at 11:00 hrs showing off her favourite pieces, and the boutique saw a HUGE spike in sales. Win-win!
normalised: I remember when my friend Priya collaborated with a local boutique in Lajpat Nagar back in January two thousand and twenty three. She is a fashion blogger, and the boutique had some killer ethnic wear. The campaign was a total hit! She showcased their kurtis on her Insta feed, did a live session on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty three at eleven hundred hours showing off her favourite pieces, and the boutique saw a huge spike in sales. Win-win!

unnormalised: So, how do you bag these collabs? First, hone your niche. What are you passionate about? What makes you, you? Then, start small. Offer to review products, run a contest for a local brand, or even just shout them out in your stories. And always, ALWAYS be professional. Respond to emails promptly, deliver on your promises, and be authentic. No one likes a sellout!
normalised: So, how do you bag these collabs? First, hone your niche. What are you passionate about? What makes you, you? Then, start small. Offer to review products, run a contest for a local brand, or even just shout them out in your stories. And always, always be professional. Respond to emails promptly, deliver on your promises, and be authentic. No one likes a sellout!

unnormalised: Another great example is when Rohit, a travel blogger from Delhi, collaborated with a homestay in Kerala for a 3-day trip. His stunning pictures and travelogues reached thousands, resulting in bookings. He even offered a 10% discount code valid till 30/06/2024. Talk about a smart partnership!
normalised: Another great example is when Rohit, a travel blogger from Delhi, collaborated with a homestay in Kerala for a three day trip. His stunning pictures and travelogues reached thousands, resulting in bookings. He even offered a ten percent discount code valid till thirtieth June two thousand and twenty four. Talk about a smart partnership!

unnormalised: Remember, brand collaborations are about building relationships. It’s not just a quick buck; it’s about creating something valuable together. So, get out there, connect with brands you love, and watch your social media game go from zero to hero! Good luck, and don't forget to tag me in your awesome collaborations!
normalised: Remember, brand collaborations are about building relationships. It is not just a quick buck; it is about creating something valuable together. So, get out there, connect with brands you love, and watch your social media game go from zero to hero! Good luck, and do not forget to tag me in your awesome collaborations!
